General.Name: Tibet Aim Pharm Inc
General.Description: Tibet AIM Pharm. Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of medical products in China. The company's products include Miglitol tablets for diabetes; Gualoupi injection for coronary heart disease; and NalMefene hydrochloride injection for various acute poisoning, such as alcohol, organic phosphor, CO, sedative-hypnotic, opioid substance, serious infection, shock, coma, brain/spinal cord injury, cerebral infarction, and hemorrhage, etc. It also provides Carbetocin injections for prevention of postpartum hemorrhage; Domperidone tablets for treatment of indigestion, abdominal distension, belching, nausea, vomiting, and abdominal pain; Montmorillonite powder for chronic diarrhea; and Hongjin Xiaojie tablets, as well as Aceclofenac Enteric-Coated tablets. Tibet AIM Pharm. Inc. was founded in 2003 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Building C, Yingdu Building, Beijing, China, 100086
